Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.auth.AuthController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/auth") public class AuthController extends Object
REST controller responsible for handling authentication-related endpoints.

Provides endpoints for user sign-up, account verification, sign-in, password reset, and password change functionalities.

      public AuthController()

  • Method Details

    • signUp

      @PostMapping("/sign-up") public ApiRes<Res<String>> signUp(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SignUpDto signUpRequest)
      Handles user sign-up requests.

      Accepts a SignUpDto containing user registration details, invokes the AuthService.signUp(SignUpDto) method, and returns a response indicating successful sign-up.

      Parameters:
      signUpRequest - the sign-up request payload containing user details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • verifyAccount

      @PostMapping("/verify-account") public ApiRes<Res<String>> verifyAccount(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid VerifyAccountDto dto)
      Handles account verification requests.

      Accepts a VerifyAccountDto containing the user's email and confirmation code, invokes the AuthService.verifyAccount(String, String) method, and returns a response indicating successful account verification.

      Parameters:
      dto - the account verification request payload containing email and confirmation code
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • signIn

      @PostMapping("/sign-in") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthResponseDto> signIn(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SignInDto signInRequest)
      Handles user sign-in requests.

      Accepts a SignInDto containing user credentials, invokes the AuthService.signIn(String, String) method, and returns an AuthResponseDto containing authentication tokens.

      Parameters:
      signInRequest - the sign-in request payload containing email and password
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the authentication response DTO

    • forgotPassword

      @PostMapping("/forgot-password") public ApiRes<Res<String>> forgotPassword(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid String email)
      Initiates the password reset process for a user.

      Accepts an email address as a String, invokes the AuthService.ForgotPassword(String) method, and returns a response indicating that the password reset has been initiated.

      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user requesting a password reset
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • confirmForgotPassword

      @PostMapping("/reset-password") public ApiRes<Res<String>> confirmForgotPassword(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ResetPasswordDto dto)
      Completes the password reset process by confirming the reset with a verification code.

      Accepts a ResetPasswordDto containing the user's email, confirmation code, and new password, invokes the AuthService.resetPassword(String, String, String) method, and returns a response indicating successful password reset.

      Parameters:
      dto - the password reset confirmation payload containing email, confirmation code, and new password
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • changePassword

      @PostMapping("/change-password") public ApiRes<Res<String>> changePassword(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ChangePasswordDto requestDto, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String authorizationHeader)
      Allows an authenticated user to change their password.

      Accepts a ChangePasswordDto containing the old and new passwords, extracts the access token from the Authorization header, invokes the AuthService.changePassword(String, String, String) method, and returns a response indicating successful password change.

      Parameters:
      requestDto - the password change request payload containing old and new passwords
      authorizationHeader - the Authorization header containing the Bearer token
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message
